name: Warm Chocolate Risotto
description: For those chilly nights ahead: a warm bowl of creamy chocolate rice pudding made with short to medium grain rice.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup medium or short grain rice

recipeInstructions.text: In medium saucepan over medium heat, stir 4 cups milk, sugar, and salt until dissolved. Add rice and bring to boil, stirring frequently.
Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, stirring, until rice is tender and pudding is thickened, about 30 minutes. Add more milk if pudding thickens before rice is tender.
Stir in vanilla and chocolate until combined. Serve immediately.
